ui.dialogs.unsupported.reasons.apparmor: AppArmor is not enabled on the host
ui.dialogs.unhealthy.title: Your installation is unhealthy
ui.dialogs.unhealthy.description: Running an unhealthy installation will cause issues. Below is a list of issues found with your installation, click on the links to learn how you can resolve the issues.
ui.dialogs.unhealthy.reasons.supervisor: Supervisor was not able to update
ui.dialogs.unhealthy.reasons.docker: The Docker environment is not working properly
ui.dialogs.join_beta_channel.title: Join the beta channel
ui.dialogs.join_beta_channel.backup: Make sure you have backups of your data before you activate this feature.
ui.dialogs.join_beta_channel.warning: Beta releases are for testers and early adopters and can contain unstable code changes
ui.dialogs.enter_code.title: Enter code
ui.dialogs.update_backup.title: Create backup?
ui.dialogs.update_backup.text: This will create a backup before installing.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.commissioni: Adding the device, this may take a minute or two.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.main.questi: Is your device already added to another Matter controller?
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.main.answer: My device is brand new or factory reset.
My device is connected to another controller.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.new.note: You need to use the Home Assistant Companion app on your mobile phone to add Matter devices.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.new.downloa: Install it from the Google Play Store or the App Store if you don't have it.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.existing.qu: Which controller is it connected to?
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.google_home: Find your device in Google Home. Tap the gear icon to open the device settings.
Tap {link_apps_services} and choose {home_assistant} from the list.
I can't find Home Assistant on the list
You are redirected to the Home Assistant app. Please follow the instructions.
Find your device in Google Home. Tap the gear icon to open the device settings.
Tap {link_apps_services} and choose {use_pairing_code} form the list
Paste the code you just received from the other controller.
Find your device in Apple Home and open {accessory_settings}.
Scroll all the way down and tap {turn_on_pairing_mode}.
You now see the setup code.
Paste the code you just received from the other controller.
ui.dialogs.matter-add-device.generic.cod: Search for the sharing mode in the app of your controller, and activate it. You will get a sharing code, enter that below.
ui.errors.config.visual_editor_not_suppo: The visual editor is not available for this type of element.
ui.errors.config.edit_in_yaml_supported: You can still edit your config using YAML.
ui.errors.config.configuration_error_rea: The configuration is not valid. Check the logs for more information.
ui.errors.config.editor_not_supported: Visual editor is not supported for this configuration
ui.errors.config.key_not_expected: Key ''{key}'' is not expected or not supported by the visual editor.
ui.errors.config.key_wrong_type: The provided value for ''{key}'' is not supported by the visual editor. We support ({type_correct}) but received ({type_wrong}).
ui.errors.config.no_template_editor_supp: Templates not supported in visual editor
ui.errors.config.media_query_not_support: This media query is not supported by the visual editor.
ui.errors.supervisor.title: Could not load the Supervisor panel!
ui.errors.supervisor.wait: If you just started, make sure you have given the Supervisor enough time to start.
ui.errors.supervisor.reboot: Try a reboot of the host.
